title: Mentio
description: Mentio is an AI-driven social listening tool tailored for B2B SaaS founders and growth teams. It automates the tracking of brand mentions and identifies high-intent leads across 12 major social media platforms like LinkedIn, Reddit, Twitter, and TikTok. By utilizing advanced keyword analytics, smart filtering, and context-aware automated responses, Mentio ensures B2B businesses engage only relevant prospects, boosting sales and brand visibility effortlessly.
